question: Which season (Winter, Summer, Monsoon, Post-Monsoon) has the {stats} {method} {col}  levels in {year} ?
code:
def true_code():
    import numpy as np
    import pandas as pd
    main_data = pd.read_csv("raw_data/main_data.csv")
    main_data['Timestamp'] = pd.to_datetime(main_data['Timestamp'])
    data = main_data[main_data["Timestamp"].dt.year == {code_year}]
    data["season"] = data["Timestamp"].dt.month.apply(lambda x: "Winter" if x in [10, 11, 12] else "Summer" if x in [3, 4, 5] else "Monsoon" if x in [6, 7, 8] else "Post-Monsoon")
    data = data.groupby("season")["{code_col}"].{code_method}.reset_index()
    data = data.sort_values(by=["{code_col}"])
    print(data.iloc[{code_stats}]["season"])


true_code()
